Class AbstractActionListener<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.action.AbstractActionListener<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of the action event
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener<E>, Bean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractToggleActionListener

    public abstract class AbstractActionListener<E>
extends Object
implements ActionListener<E>
    A base class for ActionListeners.

    puce
